channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 11/30/2025: Polymarket; CRISPR Kids; Lamine Yamal
item.description: First, Polymarket lets you bet on almost anything. Then, a look at teens' innovative Lyme disease research. And, Lamine Yamal: The 60 Minutes Intervie...

item.title: Plane skids off icy runway as snow snarls post-Thanksgiving travel
item.description: Overall, more than 1,400 flights across the country were canceled Saturday, with the majority due to weather hitting the upper Midwest, according to F...

item.title: Rubio says "more work to be done" after hours of U.S.-Ukraine talks
item.description: Diplomats have been focused on revisions to a proposed plan developed in negotiations between Washington and Moscow.

item.title: Investigators urge witnesses of the deadly shooting at a child’s party in California to come forward
item.description: Authorities are urging witnesses of a deadly shooting at a child’s birthday party in Stockton, California, to come forward as they continue to search ...

item.title: Appeals court disqualifies Alina Habba as acting U.S. attorney in New Jersey
item.description: A federal appeals court on Monday upheld a lower court decision that disqualified Alina Habba as acting U.S. attorney in New Jersey.

item.title: Appeals court upholds disqualification of Alina Habba as US attorney for New Jersey
item.description: A federal appeals court has disqualified President Trump's former personal attorney Alina Habba from serving as the U.S. attorney for New Jersey.

item.title: WATCH: Bear enjoys fresh snowfall at Chicago zoo
item.description: A resident bear at Brookfield Zoo Chicago took delight in the fresh snowfall over the weekend, rolling around in the snow.

item.title: National Guardsmen shooting suspect: Afghan commander's death, financial woes surface
item.description: The death of the commander -- whom Rahmanullah Lakanwal is said to have revered -- had deeply saddened the suspect, sources said.

item.title: Trump invites families of 2 National Guard members who were shot to visit the White House
Suspect in National Guard attack struggled with ‘dark isolation’ as community raised concerns
WATCH: Electric-blue ribbon eel stuns divers off the coast of Indonesia
item.description: Divers were treated to an unusual sight in the waters near Bali: a blue ribbon eel gracefully undulating through the sea.
